SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Institute relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Nova Institute is {above} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara Academy}.

VE.A: Nova Institute's publication count in 1984 is {125.03} papers.

VE.A: Luminara Academy's publication count in 1987 is {79.82} papers.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Publication Count in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum publication count is {66.88} papers.

EVJ.A: The global maximum publication count is {146.86} papers.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Publication Count level recorded for Luminara Academy?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy reached approximately {109.95} papers in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Publication Count level recorded for Luminara Academy?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy's lowest recorded level is approximately {66.88} papers in {1989}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Publication Count?
SC.A: The average total publication count is {209.48} papers.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Publication Count exceed 213.47 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Publication Count go below 206.05 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1985, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1979 and 1985 was {smaller} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1987, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1981 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1979 and 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Publication Count in 1985 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total publication count in 1985 was {lower} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Publication Count in 1980 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total publication count in 1980 was {lower} than in 1987.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Nova Institute} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Luminara Academy, Nova Institute}.
